mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from order_table
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into order_table (ORDER_ID, ID, USER_NAME, SHIPP_ADDRE, SHIPP_PHONE, PAY_METHOD, GOODS_COOD, GOODS_NAME, GOODS_TYPE, FREIGHT, GOODS_WEIGHT, GOODS_VOLUME, GOODS_NUM, CONSIGNEE_NAME, RECE_ADDR, RECE_PHONE, ORDER_STATUS, STATUS, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, REMARK ) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shippAddre,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shippPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsCood,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{freight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsWeight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsVolume,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{consigneeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

update order_table
ORDER_ID = #{record.orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
USER_NAME = #{record.userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHIPP_ADDRE = #{record.shippAddre,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
